body:
Hiya Guys, yesterday I went on a hike up "Flattop Mt." (In Alaska). It was amazing, so I thought I would share some photos! :D It took about 1-2 hours to get to the very top (which we managed to get up to), and about 2 1/2 hours to climb down..With that said, it was just INCREDIBLE! It was terrifying if you fell, which I did a couple times. xD  Anyway here are the photos.... Have you guys done any amazing outdoor activities ? If so, say them! I would love to read them!;) -Dubby

What we had to climb up (Not even 1/10000th of the climb :0)


At the very top :O (I'm on the very right;)


This is the view :O (Looks incredible in person!)
